Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web

Interface ErrorWebRoute

All Superinterfaces:
AcceptAwareRoute<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>, ErrorAwareRoute<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>, Route<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>
public interface ErrorWebRoute extends ErrorAwareRoute<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>, AcceptAwareRoute<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>, Route<ErrorWebExchange<Throwable>>

An error web route specifies criteria used to determine the error web exchange handler to execute to handle a failing request.

It basically supports the following criteria:

  • the type of the error thrown during the regular processing of a request
  • the content type of the resource
  • the language tag of the resource
Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
